mapper.select: select e.id,e.createid,e.title,c.name as type,e.views,date_format(e.updateTime,'%Y-%m-%d') updateTime, e.status,date_format(e.publishTime,'%Y-%m-%d') publishTime,e.startDate,e.endDate,e.imgUrl,e.address,e.introduce, case when e.createrType = 1 then (select u.username from t_oms_user u where u.id = e.createid) when e.createrType = 2 then (select m.enterpriseName from t_m_member m where m.id = e.createid) end as createName, ci.name as cityName,p.name as provinceName,a.name as areaName from t_c_exhibition e left join t_dictionary_constant c on e.`type` = c.code and c.`type` = 17 left join t_dictionary_city ci on ci.code = e.city left join t_dictionary_province p on p.code = e.province left join t_dictionary_area a on a.code = e.area where e.is_deleted = 0 and e.type = #{type} and e.status = 1 order by e.updateTime desc limit 0,#{count}
